author: Joe Skrebels
title: Liberated, Scourgebringer and More: The Best Games That Should Have Been at Rezzed 2020
description: We should have been at Rezzed, but we've still played some of the best games due to go on show.
content: We here in the IGN UK office really like Rezzed. The indie-focused show is: a) Packed to the airy rafters with new, exciting, and deeply strange games, b) Within walking distance of our office, and c) Has a pub on-site.It's the best, basically, which makes it… [+10858 chars]
